Uses of Class
acolyte.jdbc.Java8CompositeHandler

    • Uses of Java8CompositeHandler in acolyte.jdbc

      Fields in acolyte.jdbc declared as Java8CompositeHandler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Java8CompositeHandler AcolyteDSL.handleStatement
      Creates an empty handler.
      Methods in acolyte.jdbc that return Java8CompositeHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Java8CompositeHandler AcolyteDSL.handleQuery(QueryHandler h)
      Creates a new handler detecting all statements as queries (like `handleStatement.withQueryDetection(".*").withQueryHandler(h)`).
      static Java8CompositeHandler AcolyteDSL.handleQuery2(Java8CompositeHandler.ScalarQueryHandler h)
      Creates a new handler detecting all statements as queries (like `handleStatement.withQueryDetection(".*").withQueryHandler(h)`).
      Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withQueryDetection(Pattern... pattern)
      Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withQueryDetection(String... pattern)
      Returns handler that detects statement matching given pattern(s) as query.
      Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withQueryHandler(QueryHandler h)
      Returns handler that delegates query execution to |h| function.
      Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withQueryHandler1(Java8CompositeHandler.RowListQueryHandler h)
      Returns handler that delegates query execution to |h| function.
      <T> Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withQueryHandler2(Java8CompositeHandler.ScalarQueryHandler<T> h)
      Returns handler that delegates query execution to |h| function.
      Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withUpdateHandler(UpdateHandler h)
      Returns handler that delegates update execution to |h| function.
      Java8CompositeHandler Java8CompositeHandler.withUpdateHandler1(acolyte.jdbc.Java8CompositeHandler.CountUpdateHandler h)
      Returns handler that delegates update execution to |h| function.
